title: package.xml for easy integration with catkin/ament

content.raw:
Hi

I noticed that none of ignition's repositories (and gazebo) have a package.xml which makes creating a from source setup a bit of a nuisance. Is there a rationale behind this (except that 
ROS and ignition are independent)?
 
 I've created `package.xml` for my own use for gazebo, ign-math, ign-cmake, ign-tools, ign-msgs, ign-transport and meta-package ignition (following the traditional layout in ROS). If you're interested, I can upstream them.
